hay is any one going to do an xbox 360 one i hop so

@ druid513

Tons of people have completed this DLC, I got replies from them via forum.

@ pidgebc

Another random game bug then. Some people had the same type of problems with "Legacy" as well. I have no idea what's causing it. DLCs work just fine for the majority of people.

As far as I can tell, these are random script bugs. Reinstall the game, and if it still isn't fixed, start a new game. That's the only thing to do, since BioWare is not willing to fix its bugs, apparently.

@ warwind74

Xbox 360 release won't be coming from me, that's for certain.

@ jacksond2nd

I can't help with any sort of DLC bugs, I am not a developer. There are some bugs I can fix, yes, but script bugs are not that type.

Understand, these are completely random bugs. Some script somewhere has loaded improperly. There can be hundreds of reasons for this. I can't go around checking each and every one.

As far as fixing goes, all I can do is suggest the same: reinstall the game, and if it won't fix the bug, start a new game. There is nothing else to do.
